exportFormats.name: Import #1
exportFormats.outputPathTemplate: {% set authlist = authors %} {%- if creators.length>2 %} {%- set authlist = creators[0].lastName+' et al.'-%} {% endif -%} {%- if creators.length == 1 %} {%- set authlist = creators[0].lastName-%} {% endif -%} {%- if creators.length == 2 %} {%- set authlist = creators[0].lastName+' & '+creators[1].lastName-%} {% endif -%}{{authlist}} ({{date | format("YYYY")}}) {{title}}.md
